properties.description: Every Thursday 10am - 12noon, complimentary tea, coffee and biscuits. Each week, Social Prescriber from Shipston Medical Centre will be there along with a South Warwickshire and Worcester MIND counsellor, then each: 1st week of month - IT Help 2nd week of month - Cooking Group 3rd week of month - Frailty Nurse from Shipston Medical Centre 4th week of month - Shipston Home Nursing, bereavement support and a bowl of soup Free parking and Blue Badge spaces available

properties.address: Whitnash Methodist Church, Leamington Spa, Warwickshire CV31 2JJ
properties.description: A space to talk and to listen. Being there, listening and making others feel welcome can change lives, more than that it can save lives. Whitnash WARM HUB is a place to meet and chat with others, simply around a table or quietly, or possibly a little more competitively while playing a game! Come and say hello at Whitnash Methodist Church every Thursday between 11.30am-1.30pm. properties.description:
Warm Welcome Drop-in @Stratford Library

FREE hot drinks, board games, puzzles and chat. We look forward to meeting you. Special events are included on the following dates, no need to book, just drop-in:

Wed 7th Feb – Local author Bernie Mintz on ‘Confessions of a Chef’, prompt 2pm start
Wed 21st Feb ‚Äì Trading Standards – learn more about rogue traders and scams
Wed 6th March – Local author Charmaine Host on ‘Purple into Gold’, prompt 2pm start

properties.address: Bishopton Community Centre, Drayton Ave, Stratford-upon-Avon CV37 9PB
properties.description:
We are a friendly bunch of people always looking to welcome new folk. We have different activities each week alongside regular seated exercise. We have hot drinks and cake, with chat and company. All ages and abilities welcome. No charge for anything.

The centre has free WiFi and is an accessible venue with a disabled toilet and no steps anywhere. There is also a shower available to use if required.
properties.title: Bishopton Social Warm Hub
